availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Schuetz (Trigg County, Kentucky, shoemaker and postmaster.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, shoemaker and postmaster. Native of Germany. Married to Sarah Parma Schuetz. Father of Henry Schuetz, Amelia Schuetz, Mary Schuetz, and Ellen Schuetz. Shoemaker in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1860. Postmaster for Cadiz in Trigg County from June 30, 1864, to January 15, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 190.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994056, Trigg County Births.
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, Records of the Post Office Department, NARA Series M841, RG 28, Trigg County, Kentucky, vol. 28, p. 185.
